trigger.name: Plex - HIGH number of Sync/Conversions on {HOST.NAME}
Plex - HIGH number of webthreads on {HOST.NAME}

dependency.name: Plex - VERY HIGH number of webthreads on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: Plex - Jobs stuck in Sync/Conversions on {HOST.NAME}
Plex - VERY HIGH number of webthreads on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: (({Template Plex Media Server:log[/var/lib/plexmediaserver/Library/Application Support/Plex Media Server/Logs/Plex Crash Uploader.log].iregexp(crash)})<>0)
trigger.recovery_expression: (({Template Plex Media Server:log[/var/lib/plexmediaserver/Library/Application Support/Plex Media Server/Logs/Plex Crash Uploader.log].change(10m)})=0)
trigger.name: Plex crash found in crash logs on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: (({Template Plex Media Server:log[/var/lib/plexmediaserver/Library/Application Support/Plex Media Server/Logs/Plex Media Server.log,(?i)(?:slow|error)].iregexp(crash)})<>0)
trigger.name: Plex crash found in logs on {HOST.NAME}
